Package de.oth.blocklib.helper.areas

Interface DefinedArea

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockArea, CylinderArea, SphereArea
public interface DefinedArea
An Interface for classes which are used for defining areas. Their main use is to check if something is inside of that area, or to get all Chunks that contain the blocks of that area.
Author:
Tobias Mueller

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<ChunkIDObject> getContainedChunks()
    A method that can be used to get all Chunks that are inside of the DefinedArea.
    java.util.ArrayList<Entity> getContainedEntities()
    A method that can be used to get a list of all Entities that are currently in the DefinedArea.
    org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getRandomPos()
    A method that can be used to get a random position inside of the DefinedArea.
    boolean isInside​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f pos)
    A method that can be used to find out if any position is inside of the area.
    void move​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f delta)
    In some cases it might be necessary to move the whole DefinedArea.

  • Method Details

    • isInside

      boolean isInside​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f pos)
      A method that can be used to find out if any position is inside of the area.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position that should be inspected.
      Returns:
      true if the position is inside of the are, else false.

    • getRandomPos

      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getRandomPos()
      A method that can be used to get a random position inside of the DefinedArea.
      Returns:
      a random position inside of the DefinedArea

    • getContainedChunks

      java.util.ArrayList<ChunkIDObject> getContainedChunks()
      A method that can be used to get all Chunks that are inside of the DefinedArea. Especially useful for loading an area with the CunkStorage, out of the ChunkManager's range.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all Chunks that are partly inside of the DefinedArea

    • getContainedEntities

      java.util.ArrayList<Entity> getContainedEntities()
      A method that can be used to get a list of all Entities that are currently in the DefinedArea. This can use the isInside function and could be implemented once for all areas. Because of this it might have to be moved.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all Entities that are currently contained in the DefinedArea.

    • move

      void move​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f delta)
      In some cases it might be necessary to move the whole DefinedArea.
      Parameters:
      delta - the direction in which the DefinedArea should be moved.
